sourcesContent:
import { useState } from 'react' import emailjs from 'emailjs-com' const initialState = { name: '', email: '', message: '', } export const Contact = (props) => { const [{ name, email, message }, setState] = useState(initialState) const handleChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target setState((prevState) => ({ ...prevState, [name]: value })) } const clearState = () => setState({ ...initialState }) const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() console.log(name, email, message) emailjs .sendForm( 'bahalecode', 'template_344am1s', e.target, 'user_rayodiGCpUWj4QUfHPvIY' ) .then( (result) => { alert("We really appreaciate you reaching out to us. We will return a favour soon. Enjoy your day.:)") window.location.reload(); clearState() }, (error) => { alert('An error was encounter, Please try again', error.text); clearState() console.log(error.text) } ) } return (

Get In Touch

Please fill out the form below to send us an email and we will get back to you as soon as possible.

) }
